humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the left axillary sentinel lymph nodes were negative for metastatic tumor (0/2). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 8, which state that N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in all assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the left axillary sentinel lymph nodes, which were biopsied, were negative for metastatic tumor (0/2). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The N stage is determined by the presence and extent of cancer in the lymph nodes. In this case, since there is no cancer found in the lymph nodes, the N stage is N0.
